x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/structuremap-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/StructureMap \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"StructureMap","id":"e79c7efd-e0a4-4b82-83ac-ec440e017546","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/example","identifier":[{"system":"urn:ietf:rfc:3986","value":"urn:oid:37843577-95fb-4adb-84c0-8837188a7bf3"}],"version":"0.1","name":"ExampleMap","title":"Example Map","status":"draft","date":"2017-03-09T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"HL7 FHIR Standard","contact":[{"telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org/fhir"}]}],"description":"Example Structure Map","jurisdiction":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm","code":"009","display":"Oceania"}]}],"group":[{"name":"Examples","typeMode":"none","documentation":"test -> testValue","input":[{"name":"test","mode":"source"}],"rule":[{"name":"rule1","source":[{"context":"Source","type":"SourceClassA","element":"test","variable":"t"}],"target":[{"context":"Destination","contextType":"variable","element":"testValue","transform":"copy"}]}]}],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.594+08:00"}}'
